price: 23. Wuxuuna keenay xanuunkii foosha geed timir ah jiriddiisa. Waxay tidhi:“Alla haddaan dhiman lahaa waxaan ka hor, oo aan ahaan lahaa mid la halmaamo oo la waayo araggeeda”.
arabic: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلۡمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ قَالَتۡ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي مِتُّ قَبۡلَ هَٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسۡيٗا مَّنسِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ajāahā al-makhāḍu ilā jidh'ʿi al-nakhlati qālat yālaytanī mittu qabla hādhā wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
